DOC.brief_summary: About 30% of patients were reported to suffer inadequate bowel preparation.
DOC.brief_title: A Predictive Model for Inadequate Bowel Preparation Before Colonoscopy: Development and Validation
DOC.detailed_description: Risk factors, such as diabetes, constipation, history of intra-abdominal or pelvic surgery, etc, have been demonstrated to be important predictors for inadequate bowel preparation. The aim of the study is to create and verify a predictive model for inadequate bowel preparation in Chinese.
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing colonoscopy. patients older than 18 years. patients referred for emergency colonoscopy.
